amendment.description: To ensure that the Secretary of the Interior collaborates fully with State and local authorities and certain nonprofit entities in managing the Corolla Wild Horse population on Federal land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3175 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3175 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Burr to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3175 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3175 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Burr to Amendment SA 2953.
